text.8_Daf, 46_Line: He replied, this is what R’ Yochanan said:
text.8_Daf, 44_Line: R’ Nachman said to R’ Yitzchak:
text.8_Daf, 45_Line: What does this verse mean? “In your midst is the Holy One, and I will not enter a city.” (Hoshea 11:9) Because the Holy One is in your midst, I will not enter a city?!
text.8_Daf, 47_Line: The Holy One said ‘I will not enter Jerusalem above until I can enter Jerusalem below.
text.8_Daf, 48_Line: And is there a Jerusalem above?
text.8_Daf, 49_Line: Yes, it is written “The built-up Jerusalem is like a city that was joined together within itself.” (Psalms 122:3)
